name: Interlinked (coostick, aultool)
description:
As a consequence of a malfunction on the space freighter you find yourself trapped and your oxygen tank damaged.

Luckily, a fellow member of the crew helps you out by sharing their tank's reserve.
Now you have to navigate the ship in search of an escape pod while also being mindful not to tread far as you'll risk tearing the tether that keeps both of you alive.

In a way you could say that you both are interlinked. Embark in local co-op or train your piano skills by controlling both characters at the same time solving the puzzles to progress!

Controls:
Player 1: WASD and E

Player2: Arrowkeys and Enter

Code: @aultool (discord: snopix'na #1917)

Art: @coostick (discord: Dude#9843)

This project was made as a part of theBatya Game Jam with the Addiction/Dependance theme.
